attributes.action: Include Nigel Farage in all negotiations re EU
attributes.additional_details:
Mr Farage is the most qualified person in the UK to be such leader, especially in view of his vast experience as a leading MEP from 1999 to date and his financial expertise - he worked in the City as a very successful commodities broker for many years.
                                                                Irene Baldock
attributes.background: I, the undersigned, call upon the Government to appoint Nigel Farage as a leader in any team appointed to negotiate, either formally or informally, with the European Commission the UK's withdrawal from the EU.
